org.eclipse.persistence.jpa.jpql
Class DefaultTextEdit

java.lang.Object
  org.eclipse.persistence.jpa.jpql.DefaultTextEdit
All Implemented Interfaces:
TextEdit
public class DefaultTextEdit
extends java.lang.Object
implements TextEdit

The default implementation of a Text, which contains the location of the change within the JPQL query (offset) and the old and new values.

Version:
2.4
Author:
Pascal Filion
Since:
2.4
